fields.name: Tear of the Goddess
fields.description: +250 Mana +25% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants 4 maximum Mana on spell cast or Mana expenditure (up to 2 times per 8 seconds). Grants 1 maximum Mana every 8 seconds. Caps at +750 Mana. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
